AttackModel.NameOfTheChallenge: HTML Injection and SSRF through Image Renderer

Steps.Description: Inject malicious HTML code to exploit HTML Injection vulnerability.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to inject HTML code that triggers a server-side action.
StepDetails.Action: Inject HTML code that includes a request to an internal resource (http://localhost:5000/admin) and captures the request made by the server.
StepDetails.Result: The server processes the injected HTML code and makes a request to the specified internal resource.

Steps.Description: Craft a payload to exfiltrate the contents of http://localhost:5000/admin using SSRF.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to abuse the SSRF vulnerability in wkhtmltoimage to exfiltrate the contents of http://localhost:5000/admin.
StepDetails.Action: Craft a payload that includes a request to http://localhost:5000/admin and captures the response.
StepDetails.Result: The SSRF vulnerability allows the attacker to make a request to http://localhost:5000/admin and retrieve its contents.
